title: Lae'zel
tags: where to find laezel in bg3

content: Demir and Auntie Ethel. When the player emulates the roar of a mind flayer while talking to Lorin. Drink from the well in the Putrid Bog, near Auntie Ethel's house. Tell Gandrel the location of your camp if Astarion is not in the party When speaking to Gandrel with Astarion, snitch on Astarion and let Gandrel take him away. Convince Auntie Ethel to let Mayrina go and give you power. (High DC Check) Execute a surrendered Auntie Ethel To Gandrel without Astarion , tell him camp location When talki
